Html.name: Html0
Html.content: Technically, model groups are a new content type modelgroup. The type is similar to a container page. It has always a base_container with only the group's root element inside. This element has special settings attached, e.g., a setting that identifies if the group is a reuse or a copy group. If not configured differently model groups are stored the same way as any other XML content, which means for model groups: they are stored under .content/modelgroup.
